content:
The provided code chunk initializes and configures a right-click popup menu for a listbox component in a GUI-based TaskManagerControls class. The popup menu includes two commands: 'Remove Task' which deletes the currently selected task, and 'Remove Matching Tasks' which removes all tasks with the same name as the selected one. This functionality is part of the initialization process (`__init__` method) that sets up the graphical user interface for managing tasks in an application.

self._popupMenu = tk.Menu(self.taskListBox.component('listbox'),
                                  tearoff = 0)
        self._popupMenu.add_command(
            label = 'Remove Task',
            command = self.removeCurrentTask)
        self._popupMenu.add_command(
            label = 'Remove Matching Tasks',
            command = self.removeMatchingTasks)
